channel.title: RazorscapeV2 | Brand New 718 | Double XP weekend
channel.description:
[center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Welcome to Razorscape[/size][/font][/center] [font=times new roman][center][size=12pt]Miss The Old Days Playing Runescape Before EOC? Come Check Out Razorscape And Relive The The Good Times.[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/9ca4cc41b9ad41e2b4c97acee51d2032.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Website/Fourms:[/size][/font][/center] [center][url=http://www.razor-scape.com/]http://www.razor-scape.com/[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.razor-scape.com/]http://www.razor-scape.com/[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.razor-scape.com/]http://www.razor-scape.com/[/url][/center] [center][font=times new roman]If You Get A Black Screen When Logging In, Lower Graphic Options (Little Rinch In Left Hand Corner)[/font][/center] [center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Download Razorscape Here:[/size][/font] [/center] [center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/1bm4mze5cmehy9m/RazorScape.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/1bm4mze5cmehy9m/RazorScape.jar[/url][/center]
[center][url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/5p345hswl0iuxfa/RazorScape.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/5p345hswl0iuxfa/RazorScape.jar?dl=1[/url][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=24pt]Razorscape Features:[/size][/font][/center] [center]- All 25 Skills Work 100% - 100% Soulwars working like RuneScape! - Item Lending working 100% - Custom Content, Unique Home Like No Other - Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack! - Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage! - Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling - Pest Control Working Exactly Like RuneScape (100%) - Custom Dungeoneering System - Recipe for Disaster - Dominion Tower with Dominion Factor Points & Shop. - Duel Arena Working just Like RuneScape - Glacors with Working Minions & Double HP Bars - 100% Pet System Like Runescape - Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around) - All Bosses with good Drop Rates - Server Notified when Users get a good Drop - Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins. - Warrior Guild with Defender Drops - Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape - Nice ways to make money - Much much more come online to find out more! - Fight Caves (63 Waves) - Fight Kiln (36 Waves) - Grand Exchange - Clan Chat System - Dungeoneering - Working Notes[/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=24pt]Razorscape Media[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Unique Home With Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around)[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/456fea7a48c2e3bcd587116cf1762c3a.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]100% Working Grand Exchange[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0593888bbc1e4122df264066cecc614b.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]100% Working Squeal Of Fortune[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6a20596516917a76ce3459b2eb1d81c7.png[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]View Player Stats[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3172ec88ad0d9c86c3d32614b5a0b168.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]World Map[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/cb37bac6358f8cd1a90def4dfd42c9f7.png[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]100% Working Loadstones[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/43295587d37f01c46ceaaf197e88c762.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Experience Counter[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8b77b79d35293ed342bb377fe4bc4e65.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Skill Guides[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9f42548658416a367063782f17c92fc8.png[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Graphic Options[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e4ddda2964bc2b2d66bd79d1c116e6a5.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Combat[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9a541a3bdf27772f5a2beeaee5386056.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]When You Die[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3e250e0e24f02597343ee089c081c4ef.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]100% Working Agility[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1b7c1883bf130b8f780619698ccaa1ac.jpg[/img] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Donor Zone[/size][/font][/center] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/73aa5918cbeddbe19871f918182de294.jpg[/img]
[center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Teleports[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/77f067e8d8b396c337d6d56f14306c14.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d2fe3256c30acad4c64651e1219c8e68.png[/img][/center] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Bosses[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/34b0d69b74825e469782b96538a938b6.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/689bdd720ab028c0590d75ee7930cf75.png[/img][/center] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Special Capes[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/b3e817e96109a24df1f2d474f2a9a3b4.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/20d488e49e1ff25cb74f5483641a0aa3.png[/img][/center] [center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Special Donor Options[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/9750b7ca4a65b19901f7087c69dce6cb.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0c6343c59d8d628e65bf042c9c1cf2ee.png[/img][/center]

item.title: RazorscapeV2 | Brand New 718 | Double XP weekend
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

stingray2121:

Well if have have to know. We have added much more stuff then what he states. You guys base youguys opinions on pitures with out even exploring the server.

Why would you expect anyone to explore your server when their first impressions are cultivated by the pictures of features that can be found throughout any server? They’d be better off playing another server that showcases its unique features within their advertisement media, knowing it is actually there. If you’ve added everything you say you’ve added then it would be beneficial to showcase it within your advertisement instead of waiting for people to explore the server, otherwise they have no incentive. Regardless, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: RazorscapeV2 | Brand New 718 | Double XP weekend
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

stingray2121:

thanks beale for letting me know, i was talking about mostly the gameframe, ima let razor know to take alook at it.

EOC stands for Evolution Of Combat. This was mostly a change in the items & npcs… When you say miss playing before the EOC, most people think about the older item models and older NPCs, which this server doesn’t offer. This server has the EOC modeled items and NPCs, so just a friendly suggestion to you guys, you should delete that part of the ad. I am surprised you haven’t gotten any hate from that either, considering the moparscape community is full of assholes. lmao. Looks good though, I might stick around.

Read full topic
